diseaseDeatils: Fever is the temporary increase in the body's temperature in response to a disease or illness.
symptom: Sweating, General weakness, Muscle aches, etc

medicine.medicineDetail: Paracetamol (Panadol, Calpol, Alvedon) is an analgesic and antipyretic drug that is used to temporarily relieve mild-to-moderate pain and fever. It is commonly included as an ingredient in cold and flu medications and is also used on its own.
medicine.uses: This medicine is used to treat acute and chronic (short and long term) painful muscular conditions, tension, headache, dysmenorrhea (painful menstruation), and non-articular rheumatism (a group of conditions characterized by muscular aches which do not arise from joints).
medicine.SideEffects: Skin rashes, itching or hives and Swelling of the throat, tongue or face.

medicine.medicineDetail: Tylenol is used to reduce fever and relieve minor pain caused by conditions such as colds or flu, headache, muscle aches, arthritis, menstrual cramps and fevers
medicine.uses: Pain relief, Fever reduction, Headache relief, Toothache relief
medicine.SideEffects: stomach pain (upper right side), loss of appetite and tiredness, itching;

medicine.medicineDetail: Panadol can be used for relieving fever and/or for the treatment of mild to moderate pain including headache, migraine, muscle ache, dysmenorrhea.
medicine.uses: This medicine is used to treat acute and chronic (short and long term) painful muscular conditions, tension, headache, dysmenorrhea (painful menstruation), and non-articular rheumatism (a group of conditions characterized by muscular aches which do not arise from joints).
medicine.SideEffects: This medicine has no known side effects. However if you do experience any unusual side effects please make sure to consult your doctor.

medicine.medicineDetail: Aspirin is a salicylate (sa-LIS-il-ate). It works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation.
medicine.uses: Headache relief, Pain relief and Fever reduction
medicine.SideEffects: ringing in your ears, confusion, hallucinations, rapid breathing, seizure (convulsions) and severe nausea, vomiting, or stomach pain and bloody or tarry stools, coughing up blood or vomit that looks like coffee grounds

medicine.medicineDetail: Advil is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). Ibuprofen works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.
medicine.uses: This medicine is used to treat acute and chronic (short and long term) painful muscular conditions, tension, headache, dysmenorrhea (painful menstruation), and non-articular rheumatism (a group of conditions characterized by muscular aches which do not arise from joints).
medicine.SideEffects:  changes in your vision and shortness of breath (even with mild exertion) an swelling or rapid weight gain and a skin rash, no matter how mild

diseaseDeatils: Influenza (flu) can cause mild to severe illness, and at times can lead to death. Flu symptoms usually come on suddenly
symptom: cough sore throat, runny or stuffy nose ,muscle or body aches

medicine.medicineDetail: Tamiflu is an antiviral medication that blocks the actions of influenza virus types A and B in your body
medicine.uses: Influenza prevention, Prophylaxis in household contacts and Prophylaxis in healthcare settings
medicine.SideEffects: Sudden confusion tremors or shaking and unusual behavior

medicine.medicineDetail: Acetaminophen is used to treat mild to moderate pain, moderate to severe pain in conjunction with opiates, or to reduce fever.
medicine.uses: Influenza prevention, Prophylaxis in household contacts and Prophylaxis in healthcare settings
medicine.SideEffects: stomach pain, loss of appetite; tiredness, itching dark urine, clay-colored stools

medicine.medicineDetail: Acetaminophen is used to treat mild to moderate pain, moderate to severe pain in conjunction with opiates, or to reduce fever.
medicine.uses: Allergy urticaria ,Allergy-induced asthma ,Decrease hives ,Pruritis
medicine.SideEffects: Liver disease, Skin reaction , Malnutrition

medicine.medicineDetail: Acetaminophen is used to treat mild to moderate pain, moderate to severe pain in conjunction with opiates, or to reduce fever.
medicine.uses: Allergy urticaria ,Allergy-induced asthma ,Decrease hives ,Pruritis
medicine.SideEffects: Liver disease, Skin reaction , Malnutrition

medicine.medicineDetail: Relenza is an antiviral medicine that blocks the actions of viruses in your body.
medicine.uses: Influenza treatment, Influenza prevention, Prophylaxis in household contacts, Prophylaxis in healthcare settings
medicine.SideEffects: sudden confusion, trouble speaking, tremors or shaking, a seizure

diseaseDeatils: Obesity is a complex disease that occurs when an individual's weight is higher than what is considered healthy for his or her height.
symptom: breathlessness, increased sweating, snoring, joint and back pain.

medicine.medicineDetail: Phentermine is similar to an amphetamine. It stimulates the central nervous system (nerves and brain), which increases your heart rate and blood pressure and decreases your appetite.
medicine.uses: Phentermine ,Adipex-P ,Suprenz
medicine.SideEffects: feeling short of breath, even with mild exertion chest pain, feeling like you might pass out

medicine.medicineDetail: Topiramate is a seizure medicine, also called an anticonvulsant. Topiramate is used to treat certain types of seizures in adults and children who are at least 2 years old
medicine.uses: Migraine prevention ,Epilepsy treatment
medicine.SideEffects: A skin rash, no matter how mild ,dizziness or loss of coordination

medicine.medicineDetail: Adipex-P is a prescription medicine similar to amphetamine. Phentermine stimulates the central nervous system (nerves and brain), which increases your heart rate and blood pressure and decreases your appetite.
medicine.uses: Weight loss, Obesity management,  Short-term adjunct to exercise and diet for weight reduction
medicine.SideEffects: feeling short of breath, even with mild exertion

medicine.medicineDetail: Semaglutide (Wegovy, Ozempic, Rybelsus) is a medicine used for weight loss in specific patients, and to lower blood sugar levels
medicine.uses: Allergy urticaria ,Allergy-induced asthma ,Decrease hives ,Pruritis
medicine.SideEffects: Weight management Obesity treatment

diseaseDeatils: A Muscle Contraction Is Triggered When an Action Potential Travels Along the Nerves to the Muscles. Muscle contraction begins when the nervous system generates a signal
symptom: Mild, uncomfortable twitches to significant discomfort to intense, severe pain

medicine.medicineDetail: Phentermine is similar to an amphetamine. It stimulates the central nervous system (nerves and brain), which increases your heart rate and blood pressure and decreases your appetite.
medicine.uses: This medicine is used to treat acute and chronic (short and long term) painful muscular conditions, tension, headache, dysmenorrhea (painful menstruation), and non-articular rheumatism (a group of conditions characterized by muscular aches which do not arise from joints).
medicine.SideEffects: The patients administered with this medicine may experience dry mouth, nausea, blurred vision, dizziness, confusion, tremor, Gastrointestinal disturbances, and restlessness.

medicine.medicineDetail: Voltral gel is a topical product for joint and muscular pain. It works to relieve the muscle pain and inflammation in the affected area by working on the skin’s surface and penetrating inside
medicine.uses: Relieves muscle pain, reduces inflammation and speeds up the natural healing process.
medicine.SideEffects: Skin rash with blisters; hives (may affect between 1 and 10 in every 10,000 people). Wheezing, shortness of breath or feeling of tightness in the chest (asthma) (may affect less than 1 in every 10,000 people).

medicine.medicineDetail: Wilgesic tablet is a combination medication used to relieve pain associated with muscle spasms
medicine.uses: Muscle spasms Arthritis pain Dysmenorrhea  Musculoskeletal pain
medicine.SideEffects: Dry mouth, dizziness, drowsiness, lightheadedness, blurred vision, nausea, vomiting, and constipation may occur

diseaseDeatils: Hypertension (high blood pressure) is when the pressure in your blood vessels is too high (140/90 mmHg or higher)
symptom: severe headaches, chest pain, dizziness, difficulty breathing, nausea

medicine.medicineDetail: Amlodipine belongs to a class of medications called calcium channel blockers. It lowers blood pressure by relaxing the blood vessels so the heart does not have to pump as hard
medicine.uses: This medicine is used in treating or managing angina (chest pain) and hypertension (high blood pressure).
medicine.SideEffects: Some patients might experience bradycardia (slow heart rate), dry eyes, rash, fatigue or altered blood sugar levels. If you experience any of these conditions please consult your doctor.

medicine.medicineDetail: Losartan belongs to a group of drugs called angiotensin II receptor antagonists. It keeps blood vessels from narrowing, which lowers blood pressure and improves blood flow
medicine.SideEffects: cold or flu symptoms such as stuffy nose, sneezing, sore throat, fever dry cough
medicine.uses: 1. Hypertension (high blood pressure), Heart failure, Diabetic nephropathy (kidney disease) treatment

medicine.medicineDetail: HCTZ is a thiazide diuretic (water pill) that helps prevent your body from absorbing too much salt, which can cause fluid retention.
medicine.uses: Edema (fluid retention) due to various conditions such as congestive heart failure, kidney disorders, or liver disease
medicine.SideEffects: eye pain, vision problems, jaundice (yellowing of the skin or eyes)
